about_the_game:
Reclaim the world from the clutches of the feline empire in this destruction-packed game! Travel from the depths of underground caverns to the peaks of towering mountains, and obliterate every stronghold of the kitty cats!

Expansive Arsenal

Wield a diverse collection of extraordinary weapons, each uniquely engineered to wreak havoc on structures and outwit cat adversaries. From triggering explosive chain reactions to deploying inventive gadgets like expanding cubes and lava tornadoes, every weapon offers a new way to approach your tactical battles.

Destructive Gameplay: Inspired by the mechanics of games like Angry Birds and Teardown, use precision and strategy to topple buildings and overcome obstacles in your path!

Vibrant Environments: Each map offers a new visual theme and architectural style, requiring you to adapt your strategy and weapon choice.

Multiple Levels and Challenges: Navigate through a series of diverse environments, each presenting unique challenges that will test your tactical skills and creativity. Explore and liberate varied landscapes, adapting your strategy with every new scene to effectively use your arsenal and outmaneuver the cat empire.

name: Kitty Collapse Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or similar. 3 Gb VRAM.
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or similar. 8 Gb VRAM.
  • Storage: 12 MB available space

short_description: Kitty Collapse is a FIRST-PERSON PHYSICS-BASED DESTRUCTION GAME! Spawn into chaotic levels filled with buildings and mischievous cats. Your goal? Cause maximum destruction using a variety of weapons to collapse structures and earn 5 stars. Master each level, perfecting the art of destruction!
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Turkish, Korean, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
